item.title: Kafka Connect sink to OpenSearch/ElasticSearch: how to sink unix timestamps
item.description: When sinking unix timestamps from Apache Kafka to OpenSearch/ElasticSearch using the dedicated connector, they are not recognized by default as timestamp in the target tech.
